website_summaries.verdict: A true classic, the Reebok NPC II brings a lot of time-tested goodness to the table. In addition to having a streamlined classical appearance, this model is also said to be very comfortable. Some wearers even say that they can wear this shoe for days on end without issue.Additionally, there are buyers who vouch for this model’s durability. At less than $90 per pair, the Reebok NPC II really does bring a lot of value
pros: Many reviewers shared that the Reebok NPC II is very comfortable to wear, adding that they can wear it at work the whole day with experiencing pain or any other issue
Several buyers expressed their admiration and love for the streamlined classical look of this model
A considerable number of those who took time to write reviews mentioned that they are very willing to recommend this pair to their friends and acquaintances
Majority of those who wrote reviews gave the Reebok NPC II favorable overall satisfaction score
A good number of purchasers noted how well-crafted each pair of Reebok NPC II shoes is
Some very satisfied wearers vouch for the durability of this model
The Reebok NPC II does not really break the bank
A good number of wearers already own several pairs, and this speaks a lot about the consistency of this product line’s quality
cons: A considerable number of wearers shared that the Reebok NPC II is too narrow for their feet
Quite a few fans of the original NPC shared that the current version does not provide as much arch support

customer_reviews.title: The End of An Era for Reebok
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tennis shoes thinking they would be like my old Reebok New Port Classic sneakers. Well color me disappointed. My old sneakers were super comfortable and beloved. These are incredibly uncomfortable. The forward seams inside the shoes rub against my little toes in whatever socks I wear. Granted they're not yet fully broken in but I don't remember my old NPC's being this uncomfortable, EVER. I can only walk in these shoes for short periods. These are made in Brazil and I don't know if that makes a difference but the care instructions that come with the shoes are in multiple languages except English. This was a very disappointing purchase. May have permanently put me off Reebok shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Like many others
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I am skeptical of buying things online especially when it comes to sizes. These were spot on. I have worn these since the 1980's and crushed me when Academy quit carrying them. And here they are on Amazon. I was so excited. These are like the ones I used to have. But they will never compare to the Kaepa's I had. which seemed I could wear a lifetime. It is very hard to find just a basic white shoe without some design/glitter on the side. Please keep making these.
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Timeless classic
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing this particular style for all 28 years that I have known him. Not to say that he hasn’t tried some others to have on hand or break up the monotony of bright white - but this shoe works for best him and his needs. Can’t find it in the store, so I buy it online for him.
customer_reviews.author: txmommy65

customer_reviews.title: The tennis sneaker is still my favorite. Some have different graphics and cost more
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Newport Classics for so many years now. Over thirty five. The tennis sneaker is still my favorite. Some have different graphics and cost more. I'm very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Thought NPC II was same as "Classic" I had three ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought NPC II was same as "Classic" I had three pairs of in past? Previous 10.5 US fit perfectly. But this design different, and toe area very constricted, to point uncomfortable. Am figuring out how to return them?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That  shoe is not commensurate to Nike, Adidas, or Converse
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of the shoes; however, they are very small!! I purchased a 10.5 with the hope they would be lose, they are tight ..tight...to the point uncomfortable!! It should be noted they run small
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Snug
customer_reviews.text: I wore them a few times and they seem to be loosing up, but still a bit snug. I increased the stars. I have worn Reebok Classic deck shoes for years. I was surprised to find that these shoes that I need in black for a volunteer gig are a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: They're good for for casual events and work
customer_reviews.text: I used the shoe sizer and bought the size it recommended based on other shoes it compared to that I own. The size runs about a half size too small. I used to wear NPC II's 20+ years ago. They were like wearing gloves on your feet. These are not nearly as supple. But I wanted a casual shoe that was comfortable, but decent enough that I could wear them our for a casual evening or in Europe without me looking out of place. I'll keep them. They're just not as good as the old models by the same name.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, foot forming shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, very comfortable. I have a wide foot but this fits snug. Foot dimensions for reference: 4.2" wide, 11.8" length - size 10 fits with room in the toe box. I previously had the all black Adidas Stan smiths but these reebok classics are much comfier and more cushioned than those. I had the white reebok classic trainers with gum bottoms which were very comfy as well and that experience led me to getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Reebok all-purpose sneakers for gym & walking
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are great for walking and general gym use. They are well-cushioned and fairly comfortable: I usually wear Wide width, not available here, so I got a half-size bigger Regular width, which are still slightly tight but not too bad. Reeboks are great sneakers! I hope this positive review does not make the seller raise the price!
customer_reviews.author: R. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the original classic. The soft supple leather wraps your feet in comfort. I cannot find these in stores where I live in the Philadelphia area. My order came all the way from Italy. It took a month. It was worth the wait. But my next pair I will have shipped two day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: What else can i say. It is a classic. Can be wear with anything. They are comfortable but check your size before buying.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Can't understand the sizing on these shooes
customer_reviews.text: I have a white pair of these exact shoes and they fit fine. This black pair of shoes is a little smaller and almost too small. Either these are fakes or Reebok is having quality control issues with their sizings. I'm debating on whether to return these.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I have been looking for this exact ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I have been looking for this exact shoe for over two years. I wore this shoe for years. I am a male nurse, these shoes look good, wear well and the price is worth the shoe. Glad to see it back Although I have not seen it in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Golfer

customer_reviews.title: My Observations...
customer_reviews.text: I found my old pair of Reebok's under the bed from about ten years ago and tried them on. Wow... I forgot what good shoes felt like... so I found these here on amazon and decided to take a chance. They definitely run small. Thanks to all the other reviewers that pointed this out! I ordered a half size bigger and they are still snug. They are about an eighth inch narrower too! The most important thing I noticed though was arch support is gone. I never realized how much more comfortable that makes your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D. ONEILL

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be made well. Nice low profile look you can get away with for business dress when a lot of city-walking is on the itinerary. But they're quite narrow. Had considered ordering a half size larger since there wasn't a width option. Should have - but they're starting to break in a bit now. Shoe stretchers helped.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Classic Reebok’s Rule!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style and they fit as they always did when I bought this style in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Cool, amazing product and reached before the time promised
customer_reviews.text: Cool , amazing product and reached before the time promised . Thanks amazon team
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed T.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Reebok’s for years. But, I don’t get it! Could it be quality control? These run smaller and narrower than expected. Too bad I threw the box out and waited too long to return them. I suggest getting half to one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: PhenixCityGuy

customer_reviews.title: Fit size is perfect and they are the most comfortable walking shoes I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit size is perfect and they are the most comfortable walking shoes I've had in a long time! I walk around 10 miles a day for work and these were a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: VoodooMan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Fit and white he’s happy Took a long time to get
customer_reviews.author: lindalee

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased these shoes for years. These where ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these shoes for years. These where delivered fast and a very well made. If I live longer I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: cjtaylor

customer_reviews.title: Those shoes are not like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Those shoes are not like they used to be . Don't buy them for this crazy price. It' s time for me to look at an another brand, no more reebok npc ii classic for me.

customer_reviews.title: sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is way off. I have always wore a 9.5 so That's what I ordered. To small so I sent them back and ordered a size 10 and again way to small. I'm done ordering these shoes and will purchase them in store.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Execllent!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these last-minute, but the delivery and satisfaction were immediate. I've been wearing these for years and just can't seem to grow away from them, so when I saw them I figured I might not get another chance and ordered them. Shoes.com did a fabulous job getting them to me lightning-quick, and the right size/color......it doesn't get better than that!! If you're going to order shoes online, go to Shoes.com!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marrocco

customer_reviews.title: Purchased what size I am and fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Crazy comfy. The shoe sized as expected. Purchased what size I am and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Classics are a classic
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing Reebok Classics for over 35 years. Since the last pair seemed a little tite, I ordered a half size bigger this time and much better fit. This is the first black pair and they'll certainly be easier to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: MKT

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: They were for my son he is happy with them

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't me I bought em for my dad and ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't me I bought em for my dad and I ask him for his size so I got em the size he told me but somehow they were big but anyways he loves em.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Reebok men's NPC II lo, white, Classic sneaker
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who likes the Reebok, lo, Ex-o-fit sneaker, which I do, but they are hard to find in sizes 9 thru 10. The Reebok NPC II Classic, lo, white sneaker is just as soft and comfortable as the ex-o-fit. It also looks really close to the same sneaker, only slight differences. I would absolutely recommend them to anyone who is a die hard fan for the Reebok Ex-o-fit sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Macchia

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers, old classics
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers, old classics, I have been wearing it for a year and that is the good performance for me, Lacoste sneakers lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These were extremely narrow. Unable to wear them for more than a few minutes. Returned.

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I'VE BOUGHT NUMEROUS PAIRS OF THESE. MY FAVORITE MOST COMFY SHOES.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the rebok mens sneaker have to be ordered a size bigger then your actual size

customer_reviews.title: A Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers were a little smaller than my other Reebok sneakers of the same size. I put stretchers in them and they are now wearable, but a little tight. I like the appearance and the quality is excellent.

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Reeboks Mens Club C and always like them. I tried this alternative the last time and it's a big disappointment. There are rough seams inside the shoe, at least on the pair I got.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Tramp

customer_reviews.title: Great comeback!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband who has been looking for these FOREVER and finally they are back in production. He uses them primarily for DRESS, casual wear and loves them. I know I should probably have purchase 2 pairs, but now that they are back in production I think I can wait a while. After reading many reviews it seems there is a huge group of people that have been looking for these over the last several years and word finally got out. Awesome Reebok!!!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Ortwein

customer_reviews.title: Can't find these in stores easily..
customer_reviews.text: Can't find these in stores easily...so I order them in bulk for future use. Love this design...been wearing it's various versions for 30+ years.

customer_reviews.title: I liked them a lot
customer_reviews.text: I liked them a lot, it was a gift for my husband since he was looking for them in stores and I could not find them. until I look for them here and many thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband who previously had a pair and when they wore out he could not find them again. He claims they are the most comfortable shoe he’s worn and has requested I buy a second pair sicwgen these wear out he doesn’t have to worry about not being able to find them again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I worn NPC for 30 years -- I love them. They are super light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I worn NPC for 30 years -- I love them. They are super light and comfortable. I do wear orthotic supports for my feet in them but they are very comfortable. I think anyone would be super happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: he always wanted another pair so it was great gift to give him and he aid it like ...

customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking dress sneakers. These run on the narrow side but fit me good. I take a size 11 on previous Reebok sneakers and these were similar in fit.

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, they don't look like tennis shoes which ...
customer_reviews.text: great shoes, they don't look like tennis shoes which was a plus for me. I have a wide foot so it felt tight at first but after a few days of use they feel much better

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, comfortable, foot slimming.  Love the shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Just a little snug so don't be surprised if you need to order half size larger than normal. That said, I love the shoes and have worn them (not the same pair) for the past 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: NC Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Classic tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: For fashion they are very nice -- not bulky, but fit under pants without causing them to bunch up. Support wise, they are not supportive like modern sneakers -- so I wouldn't use them to play tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Matthias

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of a shoes It is hard for me to find a casual white shoes I ran across this one gave it a try and I love them
customer_reviews.author: B Nice

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small.
customer_reviews.text: These run about a half size too small but I knew that going in. So just get the next whole size up. Otherwise a good shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Don Buczkowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneakers But Not True To Size
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers look great but I recommend ordering half size larger. Purchased for $45..wanted an exchange...guess what? No exchanges just refunds...wanted to reorder..now it's $60. Not interested. Make sure you order half size biggger to avoid the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: We purchase this sneaker every year for our son's birthday. It is a good price and fits him perfectly. In other words, it fits as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Good price. The item was delivered very fast and ...
customer_reviews.text: The full and true description of the item. Good price.The item was delivered very fast and corresponds with description.Great seller.

customer_reviews.title: It is a classic
customer_reviews.text: These Reebok tennis shoes are so comfortable. I enjoyed wearing them more than ten years ago, so when I saw them for sale on Amazon, I had to buy a pair. I was not disappointed.....they still are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Babu Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Size must be off
customer_reviews.text: Wore these exact shoes for years. No longer available in stores. Theses are not them. WAY WAY WAY TOO SMALL. Couldn't begin to wear this. Too bad.

customer_reviews.title: but the size is a bad joke. More like a size 7 than an ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look OK, but the size is a bad joke. More like a size 7 than an 8.5 and very narrow and uncomfortable. Did not seem to have much support or cushioning either.
customer_reviews.author: Vent Curtis Burkett

customer_reviews.title: The only Rebok I will buy. The heels and ...
customer_reviews.text: The only Rebok I will buy. The heels and toes are stitched so that the soles won't come off. These run narrow.

customer_reviews.title: Great Reebok Classic Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed to see that you cannot find them in stores, but I found them here on Amazon. They are excellent quality. I am very pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: No more Reebok
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed! I'll shop at the store after this. 12D felt like a 6AA. Reebok isn't what it was......
customer_reviews.author: Trob

customer_reviews.title: and said shoes felt very comfortable. The shoes I received were too narrow and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Reebok Shoe I was trying to replace was an EX-O-FIT LOW BLACK 2-1537 and size on the box was 10 1/2 M, and said shoes felt very comfortable. The shoes I received were too narrow and fit like a very tight glove. Tnx I will have to find a Reebok Store somewhere here in Connecticut.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine A. Barston

customer_reviews.title: Looking good at 91
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 91 year old Dad who loves the look of them, but he found the band that holds the laces in place to be tight and irritating on the top of his foot. We solved that problem by loosening the laces In that area.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Salyers

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the speed of delivery and the shoes were exactly as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Riley

customer_reviews.title: REEBOK AND/OR AMAZON I WANT THESE BACK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the NPC since I was a junior in high school (early 80's). They are/were comfortable and wear wwell and last a log time. When they would start not looking so spiffy I'd buy a new pair and use the old ones for everyday working around the house. I really really miss this shoe. The size 14 has always been difficult to find. If I'd have known they were not going to be available I'd have stocked up on them.
customer_reviews.author: Diyguy

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad these are still sold.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these sneakers dating back to the mid 1980's. I'm sad to see that you cannot find them in stores, but I found them here on Amazon. They are true to size and fit as expected. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gillingham

customer_reviews.title: Compared to my old Reebok's these are at least a ...
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my old Reebok's these are at least a size smaller than advertised so buyer beware, not only small in size but the width is way smaller. In addition the arch is almost non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pickens

customer_reviews.title: A Reebok that looks like a dress shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Reeboks are the brand that fit me the best and offer the most comfort. These are a little snug, but they pass a a dress shoe at work. T. Stelma, author of Happy Bay, Cole Bay Band, and Sandy Ground.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for sizes advertised
customer_reviews.text: Size too tight. Very uncomfortable. Waste of money. I cannot wear them anymore.

customer_reviews.text: Reebok changed the way they made the shoes as I have worn for years without a problem.

customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, could be a bit wider , but that may just be me. Comfy.

customer_reviews.title: The sizing and cut of this shoe is in error ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing and cut of this shoe is in error. I have worn a size 7D all of my adult life. This shoe, even though labeled 7D was way too narrow and somewhat too short in length.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brown

customer_reviews.title: Classic Rebook shoes. I've been purchasing these since I ...
customer_reviews.text: Classic Rebook shoes. I've been purchasing these since I was a teen in the 80's. This model never goes out of fashion.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have diabetes and high arches. I have always worn these shoes. I even went to se an orthopedic, he noticed my shoes and said he wears the same kind.
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: They are actually nice and flat on the inside to fit my orthotic ...
customer_reviews.text: They are actually nice and flat on the inside to fit my orthotic perfectly. Since they are leather they will relax to fit the width over time. I will likely order again.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do It! Reebok It!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes and have been for many years. This size is hard to find and Amazon delivered!

customer_reviews.title: Got within a few days fast awsome service
customer_reviews.text: I like that u keep these in stock same shoes I've worn for a long time

customer_reviews.title: They are good to wear at work
customer_reviews.text: They are good to wear at work, but I don't wear them anywhere else. It's a minor disapointment considering I have been buying Reeboks for 2 decades. They are still a quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: michael mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: but these are great.
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised that they fit perfectly. I haven't had a lot of luck ordering shoes on-line, but these are great.

customer_reviews.title: too tight
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs....for work...first pair was wearing out and perfect fit... second pair....was noticeably thinner and unable to use them..... got screwed... .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been buying these shoes for the last 15 years ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these shoes for the last 15 years and the NPC Classic for the 10 years prior to that. I always go try other shoes, but always come back to these for comfort and classic style.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with the easy exchange and the great product.......Len

customer_reviews.title: only place i can find these
customer_reviews.text: the only place to find real shoes is on line. the only thing i can find in the stores here are big plastic gaudy looking shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered based on two previous pair I've owned both purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered based on two previous pair I've owned both purchased at Reebok outlet. The pair I received was labeled 10 1/2 as ordered they were not only tight but unuasally narrow as well. The return process was a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Hollocher

customer_reviews.title: Still better than anything available at the large discount shoe outlets
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to order these because of negative reviews of how they have changed from the older version of these shoes. My old pair were worn all over the world for 8 years and finally were too worn out. So far I like the look of these and they're better than anything you can buy at any discount shoe stores. (I tried and they have NOTHING comparable!) These are stiffer and tighter than I'd prefer but I'm assuming that it will take a year of wear before they're broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Scotch Lover

customer_reviews.title: I very much wanted to like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I very much wanted to like these shoes. I have had several pairs of Reebok Ex-o-Fit shoes before and loved them. I always described them as 'Gloves for the Feet'. I mostly wore them around the house and soon discovered that I put on the Ex-o-Fits almost automatically when returning from meetings where I needed to dress less casually. These shoes do not compare. They are smaller and narrow compared to the Ex-o-Fit (I actually measured the sole length). If you do choose to buy them, I would suggest going up a half size. I still like Reebok but these don't seem to be of the same quality as the Ex-o-Fits.
customer_reviews.author: gwj

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It's irritating that I have to go through the return process because they don't advertise the correct sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Clark

customer_reviews.title: love my Reebok's
customer_reviews.text: Ah the Reebok classic! They take me back to a time when going out as a kid was sooooo cool. I always loved the look and feel of the Reebok classic leather tennis shoe. The price is about the same as they were years ago and in my opinion is a shoe that will withstand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes fits as expected but it has a large appearance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has always been consistently comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this make/model of shoe since the 80's. It has always been consistently comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo

customer_reviews.title: hard to find classic reeboks
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Finding them is becoming more and more difficult so I bought 3 pair. typical reebok shoes...feel like they are broken in the first time on the feet. High quality and comfort, I highly recommend these shoes for work or play.
customer_reviews.author: gdorf1

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I need to return they are not the men's classic I expected
customer_reviews.author: vince guerrero

customer_reviews.title: I really like them and initially have found these feel a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these shoes or very similar for many years. I really like them and initially have found these feel a little small or narrow or something, but they still fit and I have only worn them for two days, so they may still wear in and be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Horst

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A goto shoe model for me. I repeat buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought for work and has no complaints. Fit how he expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit great. Love these shoes I will order again soon ...
customer_reviews.text: Timely arrival, fit great. Love these shoes I will order again soon if my size is available.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for summer casual looks
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for summer casual looks. I was looking for a pair of white sneakers, and these are great for its price (40$).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok NPC II, Unisex Adults Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: The Unisex Npc Ii from Reebok combines a Leather upper with a durable Rubber sole. These Trainers feature Lace-up fastening, cushioned insole and Textile lining. Finished with Reebok branding, the style 6836 comes in a Black Black colourway.
